title: # 278 - James Michael & ME
description:
I sit down in the mancave with James Michael. James is a hit songwriter, singer, producer, and podcaster. We go through the similarities of the music business vs. the comedy business, how James became successful in the music industry, what it's like for James to write hit songs for big artists, why LA is a soulful city, and much more!

Check out his brand new podcast "JAMcast - The James Michael Podcast" on iTunes, Spotify, Google Play, and YouTube.

iTunes: https://goo.gl/N7ek5g

 

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. My listeners get a trial month of everything you need to keep your hair ? for just $5. Just go to www.forhims.com/bertcast

This Episode is also brought to you by Spotify. Bertcast is now on Spotify so download the mobile app or go to www.spotify.com to listen now!

This episode is also brought to you by Laughable. Find your favorite podcast guests across all podcasts. Laughable is the number one rated podcast app and it's not just for comedy! Download the Laughable app in the app store today! 

This episode is also brought to you by Leesa Mattresses. Try 100 nights risk free and get $100 off of a Leesa Mattress by going to www.leesa.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Square Space. For a free trial go to www.squarespace.com and use the offer code “Bertcast” and save 10% on your first purchase of a website or domain. 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com  
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer  
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
